GAMMLI¶

Introduce the API of GAMMLI

Created on Tue Feb 18 16:56:00 2020

@author: suyu

class GAMMLI.GAMMLI(meta_info=None, model_info=None, subnet_arch=[10, 6], interact_arch=[20, 10], activation_func=<function tanh>, lr_bp=0.001, loss_threshold_main=0.01, loss_threshold_inter=0.01, main_grid_size=41, interact_grid_size=41, batch_size=1000, main_effect_epochs=10000, tuning_epochs=500, interaction_epochs=20, interact_num=20, interaction_restrict=None, verbose=False, early_stop_thres=100, shrinkage_value=None, convergence_threshold=0.001, mf_training_iters=20, max_rank=None, n_power_iterations=1, n_oversamples=10, init_fill_method='zero', min_value=None, max_value=None, change_mode=False, normalizer=None, multi_type_num=0, u_group_num=0, i_group_num=0, scale_ratio=1, auto_tune=False, random_state=0, combine_range=0.99, wc=None)[source]¶

Generalized Addtive Model with Manifest and Latent Interactions

Parameters

  • model_info (dict) -- model basic information.

  • subnet_arch (array) -- subnetwork architecture.

  • interact_arch (array) -- interact subnetwork architecture.

  • activation_func (func) -- activation_function.

  • lr_bp (float) -- learning rate.

  • loss_threshold_main (float) -- main_effect loss threshold.

  • loss_threshold_inter (float) -- interact_effect loss threshold.

  • main_grid_size (int) -- number of the sampling points for main_effect training..

  • interact_grid_size (int) -- number of the sampling points for interact_effect training.

  • batch_size (int) -- size of batch.

  • main_effect_epochs (int) -- main effect training stage epochs.

  • tuning_epochs (int) -- tuning stage epochs.

  • interaction_epochs (int) -- interact effect training stage epochs.

  • interact_num (int) -- the max interact pair number.

  • interaction_restrict (str) -- interaction restrict settings.

  • early_stop_thres (int) -- epoch for starting the early stop.

  • convergence_threshold (float) -- convergence threshold for latent effect training.

  • mf_training_iters (int) -- latent effect training stage epochs.

  • max_rank (int) -- max rank for the latent variable.

  • change_mode (bool) -- whether change the initial value for latent effect training.

  • u_group_num (int) -- number of user group.

  • i_group_num (int) -- number of item group.

  • scale_ratio (float) -- group range shrinkage ratio.

  • combine_range (float) -- group combination range.

  • auto_tune (bool) -- whether auto tune the hyperparameter.

  • random_state (int) -- number of user group.

  • wc (str) -- build model for 'warm start' or 'cold start'

dash_board(data_dict, importance, simu_dir, save_eps=True)[source]¶

Show a dashboard for global explain, which contains the explanation of main effects, manifest interactions and latent interactions.

Parameters

  • data_dict (dict) -- explanation data for plotting.

  • importance (array) -- importance of each effects.

  • simu_dir (str) -- storage path.

  • save_eps (bool) -- whether save the eps of dashboard.

Returns

Showing dashboard.

fit(tr_x, val_x, tr_y, val_y, tr_Xi, val_Xi, tr_idx, val_idx)[source]¶

Build a GAMMLI model from the dataset (tr_x, val_x, tr_y, val_y, tr_Xi, val_Xi, tr_idx, val_idx).

Parameters

  • tr_x (array) -- explict effect feature in training set.

  • val_x (array) -- explict effect feature in validation set.

  • tr_y (array) -- target variable in training set.

  • val_y (array) -- target variable in validation set.

  • tr_Xi (array) -- implicit effect feature in training set.

  • val_Xi (array) -- implicit effect feature in validation set.

  • tr_idx (array) -- training set index.

  • tr_idx -- validation set index.

Returns

fitted GAMMLI model

get_all_rank(Xi)[source]¶

Get importance of each effects.

Parameters

Xi (array) -- implicit effect feature in training set.

Returns

array of importance.

predict(xx, Xi)[source]¶

predict result by fitted GAMMLI model.

Parameters

  • xx (array) -- the explicit features of samples for predict.

  • Xi (array) -- the implicit features of samples for predict.

Returns

prediction result
